overview: The protagonist is Ania, former art school student, a freegan, performance artist and member of the Extinction Rebellion organisation. She protests against climate change and takes part in women’s strikes. During protests she practises de-escalation – a method to reduce violent behaviours.

production_companies.name: Szkoła Filmowa im. Krzysztofa Kieślowskiego Uniwersytetu Śląskiego

title: Time to Revolt
